mapper.select: select count(t1.module_id) as size,t2.module_name as name from video t1,video_module t2 where t1.module_id = t2.module_id group by t1.module_id order by t1.module_id
select max(create_time) as createTime,video_id as videoId,module_id as moduleId, video_title videoTitle,cover_relative_path as coverRelativePath from video group by module_id order by module_id
